title: Mass Confusion
data:
{{version027}} {{flavour|Causes confusion in all who gaze upon the caster.. ---- “Go to, let us go down, and there confound their language, that they may not understand one another's speech. So the LORD scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth: and they left off to build the city.”
-KJV Bible, Genesis 11:7-8.}} '''Mass Confusion''' is a monster-only [[Hexes]] spell that tries to [[confuse]] all opponents in the caster's line of sight. Unlike [[Alistair's Intoxication]], it works on monsters that are non-[[natural]], poison resistant, or of animal or lower [[monster intelligence|intelligence]]. However, it is resistible by [[willpower]], making it ineffective against many monsters in the later game. {{monsters with spell}} Although players can no longer cast this spell, the [[Hepliaklqana]] Hexer ancestor is still able. ==History== {{Spell |name=Mass Confusion |level=6 |school1={{Hexes}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of Control]] *[[Book of Dreams]]
|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=0 }} *Prior to [[0.18]], Mass Confusion was a player-castable spell. *In [[0.10]], this spell received a small power boost.
